profileAlternative.name: Sunil Datt Vashisht
profileAlternative.headline: Front End Web Developer and HTML5 Developer at Academic Partnerships

positions.title: Front End Web Developer and HTML Developer
positions.description:
Developed and edited websites, landing pages and HTML email templates based on Adobe Photoshop designs. The combined use of HTML, CSS, Javascript, jQuery, and ASPX, among other languages, was employed in accomplishing these tasks. These items were coded with an emphasis on maximizing efficiency, load time, browser compatibility, flexibility, scalability, and the allowance of simple and timely modification and updating. Developed and maintained many successful working relationships with graphic designers, other front-end developers, back-end developers, networking/IT professionals, analytics experts, marketing coordinators, marketing managers, and email specialists in the process of completing these assignments. Some of the technologies and services utilized in these endeavors include, but are not limited to Basecamp, Marketing Pilot, Adobe Test & Target, IIS (Internet Information Services), Google Tag Manager, and VSS (Virtual Source Safe).

positions.title: Web Designer and Developer, Front End Web Developer
positions.description: developing website in Symfony MVC framework, and using HTML5, CSS3, javascript, jquery, jquery UI, photoshop, PHP.

given.text:
Sunil and I worked in the same are of the BRIT facility and had many occasions to discuss our different projects. During that time I observed the ingenuity and attention to detail that Sunil delivered with each task and project. On multiple occasions Sunil was required to learn new technology to solve a problem, and he succeeded in doing so and produced a good solution. I would not hesitate to rely on Sunil to perform his tasks and produce an excellent work product. On a personal level, Sunil is easy to work with and a good communicator. I highly recommend him.

received.text:
“Hien and I worked in the same are of the Point Group facility and had many occasions to discuss our different projects. During that time I observed the ingenuity and attention to detail that Hien delivered with each task and project. On multiple occasions Hien was required to learn new technology to solve a problem, and he succeeded in doing so and produced a good solution. I would not hesitate to rely on Hien to perform his tasks and produce an excellent work product. He is a very good and helpful person.

On a personal level, Hien is easy to work with and a good communicator. I highly recommend him.”
